titles.title: A bill for the relief of Rolen-Rolen-Roberts International of Knoxville, Tennessee.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 6/26/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named corporation in full satisfaction of its claims against the United States arising out of its preparation of a proposal in response to a Department of Commerce solicitation, later cancelled, for management services for an exhibition in Beijing, People's Republic of China.
